Notice.Title_EN: Temporary Restricted Zones on Aberdeen Main Road, Aberdeen
Notice.Title_TC: 香港仔香港仔大道臨時限制區
Notice.Title_SC: 香港仔香港仔大道临时限制区
Notice.Content_EN:
ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Temporary Restricted Zones on Aberdeen Main Road, Aberdeen


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 a.m. on 3 May 2024 to 6.00 p.m. on 2 September 2024, the following road sections will be temporarily designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:-

(a)  the western kerbside lane of Aberdeen Main Road from its junction with Fung Tin Street to a point about 60 metres north of the same junction; and
(b)  the eastern kerbside lane of Aberdeen Main Road from a point about 5 metres north of its junction with Fung Tin Street to a point about 75 metres north of the same junction.

        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:-

(a)  picking up or setting down passengers; or
(b)  loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zone will be indicated by appropriate road markings.

        At the same time, the existing restricted zones on the above road sections will be temporarily rescinded.

LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport
Notice.Content_TC:
道路交通（交通管制）規例（第374G章）
香港仔香港仔大道臨時限制區

        本人現行使《道路交通（交通管制）規例》（第374G章）第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年5月3日上午10時起，至2024年9月2日下午6時止，下列路段全日24小時暫劃為限制區：

(a)  香港仔大道由其與奉天街交界處起，至同一交界以北約60米處止的西面路旁行車線；及
(b)  香港仔大道由其與奉天街交界以北約5米處起，至同一交界以北約75米處止的東面路旁行車線。


        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：

(a)  上落乘客；或
(b)  起卸貨物。


        有關地點將設置適當道路標記，表明限制區範圍。

        同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將暫予撤銷。

運輸署署長李頌恩
Notice.Content_SC:
道路交通（交通管制）规例（第374G章）
香港仔香港仔大道临时限制区

        本人现行使《道路交通（交通管制）规例》（第374G章）第14(1)(b)条所赋予的权力，下令由2024年5月3日上午10时起，至2024年9月2日下午6时止，下列路段全日24小时暂划为限制区：

(a)  香港仔大道由其与奉天街交界处起，至同一交界以北约60米处止的西面路旁行车线；及
(b)  香港仔大道由其与奉天街交界以北约5米处起，至同一交界以北约75米处止的东面路旁行车线。


        除专利巴士及经由运输署署长发给许可证者外，机动车辆司机一律禁止在限制区内：

(a)  上落乘客；或
(b)  起卸货物。


        有关地点将设置适当道路标记，表明限制区范围。

        同时，现时在上述路段实施的限制区，将暂予撤销。

运输署署长李颂恩

(a) picking up or setting down passengers; or
(b) loading or unloading goods.

Notice.Title_EN: Temporary Public Light Bus Restricted Zone at Catchick Street, Western District
Notice.Title_TC: 西區吉席街臨時公共小巴限制區

Notice.Content_EN:
ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Temporary Public Light Bus Restricted Zone at Catchick Street, Western District


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 12.00 midnight on 31 May 2024 to 11.59 pm on 20 November 2024, the northern kerbside lane of Catchick Street from a point about 15 metres east from its junction with Davis Street to a point about 25 metres east of the same junction will be temporarily designated as a public light bus restricted zone from 7.00 am to 12.00 midnight daily.

Within the restricted zone, drivers of public light buses, except those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:

(a)  Picking up or setting down passengers; or
(b)  Loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zone will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.

        At the same time, the existing public light bus restricted zone from 7.00 am to 10.00 am and from 4.00 pm to 7.00 pm daily on the above road section will be temporarily rescinded.

LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

道路交通（交通管制）規例（第374G章）

除經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，公共小巴司機一律禁止在限制區內 ：

(a)  上落乘客；或
(b)  起卸貨物。


        有關地點將設置適當交通標誌及道路標記，表明限制區範圍。

同時，現時每日上午7時至上午10時及下午4時至晚上7時在上述路段實施的公共小巴限制區，將暫予撤銷。

運輸署署長李頌恩

延長荔枝角長順街及長茂街臨時限制區的實施期限


        本人現行使《道路交通 (交通管制) 規例》(第374G章)第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年5月3日下午6時起，至2024年7月31日下午6時止，下列路段全日24小時繼續暫劃為限制區：


(a)     長順街由其與長茂街交界以西約50米處起，至同一交界以東約50米處止的路段；及

(b)     長茂街由其與長順街交界處起，至同一交界以南約20米處止的路段。


        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：


(a)    上落乘客；或

(b)    起卸貨物。


        有關地點已設置適當交通標誌及道路標記，表明限制區範圍。


        同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將繼續暫予撤銷。



運輸署署長李頌恩

Restricted Zones in Yu Chau Street and Kweilin Street, Sham Shui Po


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 8.00 a.m. on 12 April 2024, the following road sections will be designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:


(a)     the section of Yu Chau Street from a point about 25 metres east of its junction with Kweilin Street to a point about 15 metres west of the same junction; and

(b)     the section of Kweilin Street from its junction with Yu Chau Street to a point about 10 metres south of the same junction.


        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate road markings.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

Extension of Temporary Restricted Zone in Sheung Lok Street, Ho Man Tin


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 8.01 pm on 30 June 2024 to 8.00 pm on 30 September 2024, the section of Sheung Lok Street from a point about 190 metres south of its junction with Sheung Wo Street to a point about 320 metres south of the same junction will continue to be temporarily designated as restricted zone 24 hours daily.


        Within the restricted zone, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zone has been indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zone on the above road section will continue be temporarily rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 am on 28 January 2024 to 6.00 pm on 23 July 2024, the eastern kerbside lane of Pak Tai Street from its junction with Sung Wong Toi Road to a point about 75 metres south of the same junction will be temporarily designated as restricted zone 24 hours daily.


        Within the restricted zone, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zone will indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings


        At the same time, the existing restricted zone on the above road sections will be temporarily rescinded.

Temporary Restricted Zone on Cha Kwo Ling Road, Yau Tong


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 6.00 pm on 8 July 2024 to 6.00 pm on 31 July 2024, the section of Cha Kwo Ling Road from a point about 5 metres west of its junction with Ko Fai Road to a point about 120 metres west of the same junction will be temporarily designated as a restricted zone 24 hours daily.


        Within the restricted zone, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from: -


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zone will be indicated by appropriate road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zone on the above road section will be temporarily rescinded


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

(b)    起卸貨物。

        同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將暫予撤銷。



運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Restricted Zones on On Sau Road, Kwun Tong


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10:00 am on 3 June 2024, the following road sections will be designated as a restricted zones from 7:00 am to 7:00 pm daily:


(a)     the western kerbside lane of On Sau Road from a point about 80 meters south of its southern junction with On Yan Street to a point about 160 meters south of the same junction; and

(b)     the eastern kerbside lane of On Sau Road from a point about 90 meters north of its northern junction with On Chui Street to a point about 140 meters north of the same junction.


        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zones from 7:00 am to 10.00 pm daily on the above road sections will be rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

Notice.Content_EN:
ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Restricted Zones On Chun Wah Road And Choi Ha Road, Kwun Tong


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 am on 22 May 2024, the following road sections will be designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:-


(a)     the southern kerbside lane of Chun Wah Road from a point about 25 metres east of its junction with Choi Ha Road to a point about 30 metres west of the same junction;

(b)     the northern kerbside lane of Chun Wah Road from its junction with Choi Ha Road to a point about 25 metres east of the same junction;

(c)     the northern kerbside lane of Chun Wah Road from its junction with Choi Ha Road to a point about 25 metres west of the same junction;

(d)     the eastern kerbside lane of Choi Ha Road from its junction with Chun Wah Road to a point about 30 metres north of the same junction; and

(e)     the western kerbside lane of Choi Ha Road from its junction with Chun Wah Road to a point about 30 metres north of the same junction;

(f)     the western kerbside lane of Chun Wah Road from a point about 15 metres north of its junction with the unnamed access road connecting the egress of Chun Wah Road Sports Centre to a point about 30 metres north of the same junction;

(g)     the western kerbside lane of Chun Wah Road from a point about 5 metres south of its junction with the unnamed access road connecting the ingress of Chun Wah Road Sports Centre to a point about 15 metres south of the same junction ; and

(h)     the eastern kerbside lane of Chun Wah Road from its junction with the unnamed access road connecting the egress of Chun Wah Road Sports Centre to a point about 25 metres north of the same junction.


        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zones on the above road sections will be rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport
Notice.Content_TC:
道路交通（交通管制）規例（第374G章）
觀塘振華道及彩霞道限制區


        本人現行使《道路交通（交通管制）規例》（第374G章）第14（1）（b）條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年5月22日上午10時起，下列路段全日24小時劃為限制區:

(a)     振華道由其與彩霞道交界以東約25米處起，至同一交界以西約30米處止的南面路旁行車線；

(b)     振華道由其與彩霞道交界處起，至同一交界以東約25米處止的北面路旁行車線；

(c)     振華道由其與彩霞道交界處起，至同一交界以西約25米處止的北面路旁行車線；

(d)     彩霞道由其與振華道交界處起，至同一交界以北約30米處止的東面路旁行車線；

(e)     彩霞道由其與振華道交界處起，至同一交界以北約30米處止的西面路旁行車線；

(f)     振華道由其與連接振華道體育館出口的未命名通路交界以北約15米處起，至同一交界以北約30米處止的西面路旁行車線；

(g)    振華道由其與連接振華道體育館入口的未命名通路交界以南約5米處起，至同一交界以南約15米處止的西面路旁行車線；及

(h)     振華道由其與連接振華道體育館出口的未命名通路交界處起，至同一交界以北約25米處止的東面路旁行車線。


        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：

(a)    上落乘客；或

(b)    起卸貨物。


        有關地點將設置適當道路標記，表明限制區範圍。


        同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將予以撤銷。


運輸署署長李頌恩
Notice.Content_SC:
道路交通（交通管制）规例（第374G章）
观塘振华道及彩霞道限制区


        本人现行使《道路交通（交通管制）规例》（第374G章）第14（1）（b）条所赋予的权力，下令由2024年5月22日上午10时起，下列路段全日24小时划为限制区:

(a)     振华道由其与彩霞道交界以东约25米处起，至同一交界以西约30米处止的南面路旁行车线；

(b)     振华道由其与彩霞道交界处起，至同一交界以东约25米处止的北面路旁行车线；

(c)     振华道由其与彩霞道交界处起，至同一交界以西约25米处止的北面路旁行车线；

(d)     彩霞道由其与振华道交界处起，至同一交界以北约30米处止的东面路旁行车线；

(e)     彩霞道由其与振华道交界处起，至同一交界以北约30米处止的西面路旁行车线；

(f)     振华道由其与连接振华道体育馆出口的未命名通路交界以北约15米处起，至同一交界以北约30米处止的西面路旁行车线；

(g)    振华道由其与连接振华道体育馆入口的未命名通路交界以南约5米处起，至同一交界以南约15米处止的西面路旁行车线；及

(h)     振华道由其与连接振华道体育馆出口的未命名通路交界处起，至同一交界以北约25米处止的东面路旁行车线。


        除专利巴士及经由运输署署长发给许可证者外，机动车辆司机一律禁止在限制区内：

(a)    上落乘客；或

(b)    起卸货物。


        有关地点将设置适当道路标记，表明限制区范围。


        同时，现时在上述路段实施的限制区，将予以撤销。


运输署署长李颂恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Extension of Temporary Restricted Zones on Ko Fai Road, Yau Tong


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 6.00 pm on 21 April 2024 to 6.00 pm on 22 July 2024, the following road sections in Yau Tong will continue to be temporarily designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:-


(a)     The northern kerbside lane of Ko Fai Road from a point about 120 metres east of its junction with Shung Tak Wai to a point about 195 metres east of the same junction;

(b)     The southern kerbside lane of Ko Fai Road from a point about 145 metres east of its junction with Shung Tak Wai to a point about 195 metres east of the same junction;

(c)     The northern kerbside lane of Ko Fai Road from a point about 50 metres west of its junction with Tung Yuen Street to a point about 55 metres east of the same junction;

(d)     The southern kerbside lane of Ko Fai Road from a point about 5 metres west of its junction with Tung Yuen Street to a point about 45 metres west of the same junction; and

(e)     The western kerbside of the cul-de-sac of Ko Fai Road.


        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from: -


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zones have been indicated by appropriate road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zones on the above road sections will be temporarily rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

Restricted Zone on Hoi Bun Road, Kwun Tong

Notice.Title_SC: 九龙湾限制区
Notice.Content_EN:
ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Restricted Zones in Kowloon Bay


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 am on 2 February 2024, the following sections in Kowloon Bay will be designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:-


(a)     the southern kerbside lane of Kai Shun Road from a point about 10 metres west of its junction with Wang Kwong Road to its junction with Kai Shing Street (except the loading and unloading area);

(b)     the northern kerbside lane of Kai Shun Road from its junction with Kai Shing Street to a point about 15 metres east of the same junction;

(c)     the eastern kerbside lane of Kai Shing Street from a point about 25 metres north of its junction with Kai Shun Road to a point about 20 metres south of the same junction;

(d)     the northern kerbside lane of Kai Wah Street from its junction with Wang Kwong Road to a point about 20 metres west of the same junction;

(e)     the western kerbside lane of Wang Kwong Road from its junction with Kai Wah Street to a point about 25 metres north of the same junction; and

(f)     the southern kerbside lane of Kai Shing Street between Shing Kai Road and Kai Wah Street.


        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zones on the above road sections will be rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport
Notice.Content_TC:
道路交通(交通管制)規例(第374G章)
九龍灣限制區


        本人現行使《道路交通（交通管制）規例》（第374G章）第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2024年2月2日上午10時起，九龍灣下列路段將全日24小時劃為限制區：


(a)     啓信道由其與宏光道交界以西約10米處起，至其與啓成街交界處止的南面路旁行車線（上落客貨區除外）；

(b)     啓信道由其與啓成街交界處起，至同一交界以東約15米處止的北面路旁行車線；

(c)     啓成街由其與啓信道交界以北約25米處起，至同一交界以南約20米處止的東面路旁行車線；

(d)     啓華街由其與宏光道交界處起，至同一交界以西約20米處止的北面路旁行車線；

(e)     宏光道由其與啓華街交界處起，至同一交界以北約25米處止的西面路旁行車線；及

(f)     啓成街介乎承啓道與啓華街之間的南面路旁行車線。


        除專利巴士及經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內：


(a)    上落乘客；或

(b)    起卸貨物。


        有關地點將設置適當道路標記，表明限制區範圍。


        同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將予以撒銷。



運輸署署長李頌恩

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (CHAPTER 374G)
Restricted Zones on Hang Yip Street, Kwun Tong


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 am on 19 January 2024, the following road sections in Kwun Tong will be designated as restricted zones from 7.00 am to 7.00 pm daily:


(a)     the northern kerbside lane of Hang Yip Street from a point about 40 metres east of its junction with Yan Yip Street to a point about 60 metres east of the same junction;

(b)     the western kerbside lane of Hang Yip Street from a point about 60 metres east of its junction with Yan Yip Street to a point about 110 metres north of the aforementioned starting point (excluding the parking spaces for goods vehicles); and

(c)     the southern kerbside lane of Hang Yip Street from a point about 5 metres east of its junction with Kwun Tong Road to a point about 40 metres east of the same junction.


        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses, taxis and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:


(a)    picking up or setting down passengers; or

(b)    loading or unloading goods.


        The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs or road markings.


        At the same time, the existing restricted zones on the above road sections will be rescinded.


LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

Notice.Content_EN:
ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (Chapter 374)
Restricted Zones at Siu Lek Yuen Road, Sha Tin

 
        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 am on 26 January 2024, the following road sections will be designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:

    1. the section of Siu Lek Yuen Road eastbound from a point about 135 metres west of its junction with Kwong Wing Lane to a point about 60 metres west of the same junction (including the layby); and
    2. the section of Siu Lek Yuen Road westbound from its junction with Kwong Wing Lane to a point about 60 metres west of the same junction.

        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:-

    1. picking up or setting down passengers; or
    2. loading or unloading goods.

        The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate road markings.

        At the same time, the existing restricted zones on the above road sections will be rescinded.

LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (Chapter 374)
Restricted Zone On Chui Lok Street, Tai Po

        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 a.m. on 28 March 2024, the western kerbside lane of Chui Lok Street from a point about 15 metres north of its junction with Chui Yi Street to a point about 95 metres north of the same junction will be designated as restricted zones from 7.00 a.m. to 12.00 midnight daily.

        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:

    1. picking up or setting down passengers; or
    2. loading or unloading goods.

        The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs or road markings.

LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS (Chapter 374)
Restricted Zones in Tai Po

        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 am on 12 January 2024, the following road sections will be designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:

    1. the northern kerbside lane of Ting Kok Road from a point about 40 metres west of its junction with Lo Fai Road to a point about 100 metres east of the same junction;
    2. the western kerbside lane of Lo Fai Road from its junction with Ting Kok Road to a point about 25 metres north of the same junction;
    3. the eastern kerbside lane of Lo Fai Road from its junction with Ting Kok Road to a point about 30 metres north of the same junction; and
    4. the southern kerbside lane of Ting Kok Road from a point about 65 metres east of its junction with Lo Fai Road to a point about 95 metres east of the same junction.

        Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses and those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:

    1. picking up or setting down passengers; or
    2. loading or unloading goods.

        The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs or road markings.

        At the same time, the existing restricted zones on the above road sections will be rescinded.

LEE Chung-yan, Angela Commissioner for Transport

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS(CHAPTER 374 SUB. LEG. G)
Restricted Zones on Shing Mun Road, Wo Yi Hop Lane and
the unnamed road to Ho Fung College, Kwai Chung


In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374 sub. leg. G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 a.m. on 25 August 2023, the following road sections will be designated as restricted zones 24 hours daily:

(i) The western kerbside lane of Shing Mun Road from a point about 35 meters north of its junction with Wo Yi Hop Road to a point about 62 metres north of the same junction;
(ii) The northern kerbside lane of Wo Yi Hop Lane from its junction with Shing Mun Road to a point about 35 metres west of the same junction;
(iii) The southern kerbside lane of Wo Yi Hop Lane from its junction with Shing Mun Road to a point about 27 metres west of the same junction; and
(iv) The eastern kerbside lane of the unnamed access road leading from Wo Yi Hop lane to Ho Fung College from its junction with Wo Yi Hop Lane to a point about 6 metres south of the same junction.

Within the restricted zones, drivers of all motor vehicles, except those with permits issued by the Commissioner for Transport, will be prohibited from:

  • picking up or setting down passengers; or
  • loading or unloading goods.

The extent of the restricted zones will be indicated by appropriate road markings.

At the same time, the existing restricted zones on the above road sections will be rescinded.

LEE Sui-chun, Macella Commissioner for Transport (Acting)
Notice.Content_TC:
道路交通 (交通管制) 規例（第374章，附屬法例G)
葵涌城門道、和宜合里及通往可風中學的未命名道路限制區


本人現行使《道路交通(交通管制)規例》(第374章，附屬法例G) 第14(1)(b)條所賦予的權力，下令由2023年8月25日上午10時起，下列路段全日24小時劃為限制區：

(i) 城門道由其與和宜合道的交界處以北約35米處起，至同一交界以北約62米處止的西面路旁行車線；
(ii)和宜合里由其與城門道的交界處起，至同一交界以西約35米處止的北面路旁行車線；
(iii)和宜合里由其與城門道的交界處起，至同一交界以西約27米處止的南面路旁行車線；及
(iv)和宜合里通往可風中學的未命名道路由其與和宜合里的交界處起，至同一交界以南至約6米處止的東面路旁行車線。


除經由運輸署署長發給許可證者外，所有機動車輛司機一律禁止在限制區內:

  • 上落乘客;或
  • 起卸貨物。

有關地點將設置適當道路標記，表明限制區範圍。

同時，現時在上述路段實施的限制區，將予以撤銷。

署理運輸署署長李萃珍

(iii)和宜合里由其与城门道的交界处起，至同一交界以西约27米处止的南面路旁行车线；及

ROAD TRAFFIC (TRAFFIC CONTROL) REGULATIONS
(CHAPTER 374 SUB. LEG. G)
Restricted Zone on Container Port Road, Kwai Chung


        In exercise of the powers vested in me under regulation 14(1)(b) of the Road Traffic (Traffic Control) Regulations, Chapter 374 Sub. Leg. G, I hereby direct that with effect from 10.00 a.m. on 14 April 2023, the western kerbside lane of Container Port Road from a point about 40 metres south of its junction with Kwai Shun Street to a point 50 metres south of the same junction will be designated as restricted zone from 7.00 am to 7.00 pm daily.

        Within the restricted zone, drivers of all motor vehicles, except franchised buses, taxis and those with permits issued by the Commissioner of Transport, will be prohibited from:-

        (a) picking up or setting down passengers; or
        (b) loading or unloading goods.

        The extent of the restricted zone will be indicated by appropriate traffic signs and road marking.

        At the same time, the existing restricted zone on the above road section will be rescinded.

LAW Shuk-pui, Rosanna Commissioner for Transport
